page.title: 14Animals of commoners
page.content: {Animals of Commoners The New forest{pony}is stout,sound intelligent and hardy .Venderers,who look after the forest , inspect the stock to keep up the standards. The Pony is easy to break and foot sure, they are used to traffic and man. Its grazing habit means that it will not wander off if left alone.Land in the forest has{'Commoners Rights'}and ownership entitles one to put{horses, {ponies,horned cattle, donkeys, pigs {and sheep}on the forest.{Chickens,}and {geese}may roam where they like but {NO {goats.}Other rights include turf cutting, fuel wood, and marl.The A35 has been fenced in , the underpass lets the animals cross the road.Minor roads have cattle grids to keep the animals on the forest.The{ponies}and {deer}have right of way.Agisters over see the commoners animals.{V.Lacey 8.
